data.title: Record Identification
data.definition: A unique identification number assigned by the DIA.

data.title: Province
data.definition: A three-digit code of the current accepted location of the enemy unit.

data.title: Unit Name
data.definition: Full name of the unit being reported.

data.title: Unit Size
data.definition: A three-digit code specifying the unit size, such as platoon or regiment.

data.title: Unit Strength
data.definition: Contains the current strength of the enemy unit.

data.title: Unit Nationality
data.definition: Nationality of the unit being reported.

data.title: Unit Category
data.definition: Contains a category designation for the unit.

data.title: Unit Type
data.definition: Specifies the type of force, such as Infantry, Artillery, Engineer.

data.title: Unit Function
data.definition: Specifies the function of the enemy unit.

data.title: Unit Service
data.definition: Indicates the service branch of the enemy unit.

data.title: Activity
data.definition: Indicates whether the enemy unit is currently active or inactive.

data.title: Border Flag
data.definition: '#' indicates that the unit is in the border area of South Vietnam. If the unit is not in the border area, the field is blank.

data.title: Status
data.definition: Specifies the status of the enemy unit as determined by the intelligence community.

data.title: Infiltration Route
data.definition: Route of entry into South Vietnam.

data.title: In Date
data.definition: Indicates the effective date of the enemy unit, when it was organized, when it infiltrated, or when it was placed in the order of battle file.

data.title: Out Date
data.definition: Indicates the date of deletion of this enemy unit from the file. (The record of the unit is never physically removed from the file.)

data.title: Deletion Reason
data.definition: Reason for deletion of the unit from the report.

data.title: Unit's Subordination
data.definition: Indicates the present subordination of the enemy unit.

data.title: Viet Cong Military Region
data.definition: Indicates the Viet Cong Military region to which the enemy unit is assigned.

data.title: Corps Tactical Zone
data.definition: Indicates the corps tactical zone within which the enemy unit is currently operating.

data.title: UTM Coordinate
data.definition: Indicates the unit's current accepted location in UTM coordinates.

data.title: Latitude
data.definition: Not used, reserved for future use.

data.title: Longitude
data.definition: Indicates the date the intelligence community placed this unit in a possible status category.

data.title: Possible Date
data.definition: Indicates the date the intelligence community placed this unit in a possible status category.

data.title: Probable Date
data.definition: Indicates the date the initelligence community placed this unit in a probable status category.

data.title: Confirmed Date
data.definition: Indicates the date the intelligence community placed this unit in a confirmed status category.

data.title: Update Date
data.definition: Indicates the date of the last change to the fixed fields in this record of the enemy unit.

data.title: Blank
data.definition: Allows additional fixed data fields to be specified at a later date without revising the magnetic tape file.

data.title: Province
data.definition: Contains the code for the province within which contact was made with the enemy unit.

data.title: UTM Coordinates
data.definition: Contains the UTM coordinates of the location where contact was made with the enemy unit.

data.title: Date of Contact
data.definition: Indicates the date contact was made with the enemy unit.

data.title: From Date
data.definition: Indicates the initial date of the time span covered by the data in the subset.

data.title: To Date
data.definition: Indicates the termination date of the time span covered by the data in the subset.

data.title: Strength
data.definition: Indicates the strength in personnel of the enemy unit during the time span given by fields FDATE and TDATE.

data.title: Province
data.definition: Specifies the province code of the enemy unit location during the specified time span.

data.title: UTM Coordinates
data.definition: Specifies the UTM coordinates of the enemy unit location during the indicated time period.

data.title: Corps Tactical Zone
data.definition: Specifies the corps tactical zone of operation of the enemy unit during the indicated time period.

data.title: Viet Cong Military Region
data.definition: Indicates the Viet Cong military region to which the enemy unit is assigned during the indicated time period.

data.title: Border Flag
data.definition: Indicates the enemy unit was in the border area of South Vietnam during the indicated time period.

data.title: From Date
data.definition: Indicates the initial date of the time span covered by the data in the subset.

data.title: To Date
data.definition: Indicates the termination date of the time span covered by the data in the subset.

data.title: Border Flag
data.definition: Indicates the enemy unit was in the border area of South Vietnam during the indicated time period.

data.title: Date of Information
data.definition: Indicates the date of the retrospective information.
